original_text: But ye are departed out of the way; ye have caused many to stumble at the law; ye have corrupted the covenant of Levi, saith the Lord of hosts.
korean_text: 너희는 옳은 길에서 떠나 많은 사람을 율법에 거스르게 하는도다 나 만군의 여호와가 이르노니 너희가 레위의 언약을 깨뜨렸느니라

sentences.original_text: But ye are departed out of the way
ye have caused many to stumble at the law
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 많은 사람이 율법에 걸려 넘어지게 하였고

sentences.original_text: ye have corrupted the covenant of Levi
